comment.author: 59356674@N05
comment._content: The central character is probably a 'medicine-man' and not a musician, although there's a man with a drum behind him; the dress is  more 'north' than 'south' Africa. The hut in the left background looks like it has a northern, traditional weave, and the protruding sticks  are reminiscent of Northern Nigeria. However, the structure is grass and not mud, so it probably isn't too far north.

comment.author: 59541897@N03
comment._content: some of d items hanging round his neck can still be found in some markets in northern nigeria
